issue.title: X2 laser scanner data not valid

content.raw: What is the drawback of having no GPU? after i changed gpu_ray with ray sensor the laser scan is coming properly, and i could also run the SubT environment properly in my PCwith decent performance.  Isn't it ok if i use this PC for the final event also? Because i have to buy a new laptop with required GPU if it in necessary.
content.html: What is the drawback of having no GPU? after i changed gpu_ray with ray sensor the laser scan is coming properly, and i could also run the SubT environment properly in my PCwith decent performance. Isn't it ok if i use this PC for the final event also? Because i have to buy a new laptop with required GPU if it in necessary.
